author: PR.com
title: Alýssa Brown Signs Modeling Contract with Gawk Talent; Hyped About the Opportunity
text:
Alýssa Brown Signs Modeling Contract with Gawk Talent; Hyped About the Opportunity
Niles, OH, October 21, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Alýssa Brown, 18, is fresh off a recent Saturday celebration she attended with her father and younger brother at her favorite restaurant, Red Lobster. The cause of the hoopla was putting her official ink signature to a modeling contract with GAWK Talent™.
The 5’11” slender teen with an athletic body-type, will become the face of Somorlov Cosmetics™ and Faith Bravo Fashion™. Alýssa commented after signing her contract about upcoming opportunities as a professional model.
“I’m totally hyped to sign my first modeling contract with GAWK Talent,” she said. “I’m looking forward to my first project in early 2016 as a print model, initially.”
Kindhearted, funny, and admittedly a bit sarcastic, Alýssa brings her own unique style to the modeling industry. Mr. Brown said this about GAWK Talent's new model and his daughter. “Alýssa will certainly establish her own identity in this industry, but right now, I see her as a combination of supermodel and actress Cara Delevingne, and comedian, actress, and model Amy Schumer.”
Mr. Brown also stated the cosmetics and fashion industries are well-known to focus highly on physical appearance, but it’s more important for GAWK Talent to accentuate Alýssa’s inner beauty as well. “I believe Alýssa’s fresh, healthy look and lifestyle are at the forefront of the change I see in the modeling industry,” he said. “She’s highly versatile and diverse in her style and appearance. The great thing about Alýssa is that she can effortlessly transform from natural curls to straight hair, and from no makeup to…BAM!”
A freshman at Kent State University, new model Alýssa Brown went on to stress the importance of her current academics. “College will always come first, but I’m looking forward to this modeling opportunity. Working with my dad as my manager will be really cool, too.”
About GAWK Talent Management™: Founded in 2015 by David L. Brown, GAWK Talent™ breaks from the mold of traditional model management companies and agencies, differentiating itself from the norm. Fresh, hip, classy, and edgy, GAWK Talent strives to focus not simply on a model’s appearance, but her and his overall personality and humanness as well. GAWK Talent™ promotes models as a whole person and not just a pretty face. The talent management company also doesn’t conform to traditional model industry attitudes about body-type.
